articles.title: Racism and xenophobia on the rise as coronavirus spreads
articles.description: Asians and Asian Americans are facing increased discrimination linked to the spread of coronavirus. In New York City's Chinatown, restaurant owner Rose Wu says business has dropped significantly since the coronavirus outbreak.
